sentences.sContent: She is also friends with the rock singer and instrumentalist Steve Winwood, and they have sometimes performed together.
sentences.sContent_eng: She is also friends with the rock singer and instrumentalist Steve Winwood, and they have sometimes performed together.
sentences.sCn: 她也和摇滚歌手，乐器演奏家史蒂夫．温伍德交上了朋友，他们有时还一起进行表演。

sentences.sContent: The others acknowledge him as their most talented instrumentalist as he can play all the reed instruments, piano and trumpet.
sentences.sContent_eng: The others acknowledge him as their most talented instrumentalist as he can play all the reed instruments, piano and trumpet.
sentences.sCn: 其他人认为他就是他们中最有天分的乐器演奏家，因为他能够演奏所有的簧乐器、钢琴和喇叭。

words.tran: 乐器的；有帮助的；仪器的，器械的
仪器；工具；乐器；手段；器械
使用仪器；乐器法；仪表化

trans.tranOther: someone who plays a musical instrument
